1.title: E3
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: When the crew of the UE Taco Bell Relay Delta are fast asleep, space janitors Aaron and Addison turn a portion of the space station's observation deck into a makeshift talk show set, in order to live out their true dream: To be hosts of a late-night gaming talk show. This satirical talk show in outer space includes a variety of gaming industry guests, celebrity interviews, and musical numbers typical of a late-night talk show, while making frequent use of surreal, absurdist humor; non-sequiturs, and odd walk-on characters.
